title: Nante Zurui Otoko
sinopse:
Contains 5 Oneshots:

1. What A Sly Guy - Yoshino Nene is a 16-year-old girl who fell in love at first sight with Fukazu-san, a man 9 years older than her. She sends him emails, trespasses (?), and intensely hits on him, but he won't respond to her. Finally, he told her: "I won't ever fall in love". But he looked very sad when he said that. Nene wants to know his real intentions... (Source: Intercross)

2. Leave It To You
3. Stay By Me
4. I'll Have You
5. Wolf Cherry
